meanings.definition: A natural insecticide derived from chrysanthemum flowers.
meanings.sent1: The farmer sprayed pyrethrin on the crops to keep insects away.
meanings.sent2: I bought a bottle of pyrethrin to get rid of the ants in my kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat accidentally knocked over the bottle of pyrethrin, creating a flowery mess.
meanings.sent4: The pyrethrin worked like magic, making the garden free of pests.
meanings.sent5: The sweet smell of pyrethrin lingered in the air, a sign of a bug-free home.

meanings.definition: A substance used to control pests in agriculture and household settings.
meanings.sent1: The pyrethrin was effective in keeping the garden free from harmful insects.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on pyrethrin to protect their crops from pests.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon accidentally spilled the container of pyrethrin, causing chaos in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like pyrethrin, driving away any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The bright packaging of pyrethrin caught the eye of the customers, promising a bug-free environment.
